entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'evidently expected to appreciate this treatment' by Yaxley.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, who is also in the lift with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend and companion, who is also in the lift with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: Cattermole
entities.description: A person mentioned as being treated unpleasantly by Yaxley, implying that Cattermole may be a prisoner or someone in authority.

entities.name: Yaxley
entities.description: An unpleasant character who is sweeping away toward another lift, indicating that he may be a guard or an authority figure.

relationships.description: Yaxley is treating Cattermole unpleasantly, which implies that Harry may be witnessing or experiencing similar treatment.
Ron and Harry are friends and companions, as indicated by their conversation in the lift.
Hermione and Harry are also friends and companions, as indicated by their conversation in the lift.
